name: TwineAuthenticate
description: Authenticate for uploading Python distributions using twine. Add '-r FeedName/EndpointName --config-file $(PYPIRC_PATH)' to your twine upload command. For feeds present in this organization, use the feed name as the repository (-r). Otherwise, use the endpoint name defined in the service connection.
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/devops/pipelines/tasks/package/twine-authenticate) or [see the Twine documentation](https://twine.readthedocs.io/)

inputs.name: feedList
inputs.label: My feeds (select below)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select feeds to authenticate present in this organization.

inputs.name: externalSources
inputs.label: Feeds from external organizations
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select endpoints to authenticate outside this organization. Make sure the endpoints have package upload permissions.

inputs.name: publishPackageMetadata
inputs.label: Publish pipeline metadata
inputs.helpMarkDown: Associate this build/release pipelineâ€™s metadata (run #, source code information) with the package when uploading to my feeds.
